    • Uses of TowerCoordinates in client

      Methods in client that return TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TowerCoordinates ClientCommunication.determineMove()
      Determines the next move to play, asks TUI in case of Human Player or the method of Computer Player, handles exceptions before server communication (local check).
      Methods in client with parameters of type TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String ClientCommunication.sendCoordinates(TowerCoordinates move)
      Transfers the coordinates of the next move into a format that can be sent to the server.

    • Uses of TowerCoordinates in model

      Methods in model that return TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TowerCoordinates ComputerPlayer.determineMove(Board board)
      Determines the coordinates of the tower for the next move.
      TowerCoordinates Strategy.determineMove(Board board, int id)
      Determining the next move by this strategy.
      TowerCoordinates SmartStrategy.determineMove(Board board, int id) 
      TowerCoordinates RandomStrategy.determineMove(Board board, int id)
      Determining the next move by choosing a random valid field.
      TowerCoordinates Board.getTowerCoordinates(int i)
      Returns the TowerCoordinates belonging to a tower index.
      Methods in model that return types with arguments of type TowerCoordinates 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<TowerCoordinates> Board.getAvailableTowers()
      Returns a List of Coordinates of each tower where a piece can be added, i.e.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Game.processMove(ClientHandler handler, TowerCoordinates coords)
      Processes a move determined by the given coordinates.
